page.title: 07HOME LIFE
page.content: On Saturday I get up and get my {breakfast.}Then I telephone my friends to see if they want to go up to town. If they say yes we catch the bus about 10.00 clock. When we arrive at the station we go to{Woolworths}to buy a drink of coke. After that we go to{Intersport}to look at the sports equipment. Then we go to the{Co_op}to have a look in the toy department. For our dinner we get a hamburger and a drink from{Mc Donalds.}After dinner we go to{Ashlys}which is a toy shop. When we have got everything we need we go to the bus station and catch the bus home. When my Mum gets home we have our tea. I then nip to the shop for an "Echo".When I get home I watch "Hunter" and "Cats Eyes" on the televsion. In between the programmes I get a sandwich and a drink,then I go to bed.
